name: Mq Light
description: Provides an easy-to-use platform to gamify your apps
fullDescription: Mq Light (powered by Cloudant) provides simple to use SDKs that give access to a scalable, fully managed database via familiar object-oriented APIs.
feature:
Ease of Use

Work with data in the way that mobile developers are accustomed to, with iOS, Android, and JavaScript SDKs that provide powerful object-oriented APIs instead of raw database access. The provisioning, management, and scalability of the data store is taken care of by IBM, freeing up your time to focus on your application.

Streamlined Backend Access

No knowledge of databases, schemas, or SQL is required. Work with your data as objects that you can create, update, delete, and query, and let the SDKs handle cloud-based data storage and retrieval for you.
